title: Task 120

answers.feedback: This phrase indicates a nearby location, not a different city.
It refers to a place close by, not far away

answers.answer: A short distance away on the same street.

answers.feedback: Down the street is about location on the surface, not underneath.

description: Down the street is used to describe a location that is not too far away, usually within walking distance on the same street. It's a common way to indicate nearby places in everyday conversation.
